citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25a on
18-Jul-18.
The inspector arrived and spoke with a family member. The family member stated the licensee was not available.
The inspector left a business card with the family member.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25a on
18-Jul-18.
The inspector arrived and spoke with a family member.  The family member stated the licensee was not available. 
The inspector left a business card with the family member.
